Module com.example.javaproject
Package com.example.javaproject

Class ResolveGame

java.lang.Object
com.example.javaproject.ResolveGame
public class ResolveGame extends Object
The ResolveGame class finds a path to sort the grid if possible. It contains two methods Solution() and Solution2(). The first one give the best path, the second one give a random path.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ResolveGame(Grid gridInit)
    Resolves the game by finding a solution for the given initial grid.

      Returns:

    • heuristic

      public static int heuristic(Grid grid)
      Calculates the heuristic value for a given Grid object. The chosen heuristic is 3(HammingDistance) + ManhattanDistance
      Parameters:
      grid - The grid for which to calculate the heuristic value.
      Returns:
      The heuristic value.

    • createListGrids

      public void createListGrids() throws IOException
      Saves the grid Strings to a CSV file.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while writing the file.

    • Solution2

      public static void Solution2(Grid gridInit, Grid gridFinal, List<String> gridsSolution, int move) throws IOException
      Finds a solution for the grid by performing moves from the initial grid to the final grid. This method uses a heuristic based on the Manhattan distance to guide the search.
      Parameters:
      gridInit - The initial grid.
      gridFinal - The final grid.
      gridsSolution - The list of grids representing the solution.
      move - The current move count.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs.

    • Solution

      public static List<String> Solution(Grid gridInit, Grid gridFinal, List<String> gridsSolution, int move, int moveMax) throws IOException
      Finds a solution for the grid by performing moves from the initial grid to the final grid. This method finds the minimal number of moves but is heavy.
      Parameters:
      gridInit - The initial grid.
      gridFinal - The final grid.
      gridsSolution - The list of grids representing the solution.
      move - The current move count.
      moveMax - The maximum allowed number of moves.
      Returns:
      The list of grids representing the solution.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs.

    • getMoves

      public int getMoves()
      Returns:
      the number of moves to finish the game
